Detailed Description

Universal Time Object Implementation.

This is an encapsulation of the time. It provides the following operations on basic time.

  • Construction of a UTO from piece parts, and extraction of the piece parts from a UTO. The piece parts are the readonly attributes : time inaccuracy time displacement factor structure with all the above.
  • Comparison of time.
  • Conversion from relative to absolute time, and conversion to an interval (TIO).
